content: eyelet bandana emily kessler © 2021 materials ~50g cotton yarn size 3 i used paintbox cotton dk yarn 4mm crochet hook yarn needle scissors key terms chain - chain skip - skip special stitch sl - slip_stitch shell - 5dc in the ch3 space single_crochet - single_crochet from the previous row double_crochet - double_crochet ws - wrong side rs - right side bobble - cluster of 3ch see finishing gauge swatch has 2 pattern repeats in 4 swatch should measure 4 x4 row 1 chain 17 single_crochet in 2nd chain from the hook single_crochet in next chain *chain 3 skip 2 chain** single_crochet in next 3ch repeat from * ending last repeat at ** single_crochet in last 2ch row 2 chain 1 and turn single_crochet in first single_crochet *skip next single_crochet shell skip next single_crochet single_crochet in next single_crochet** repeat from * across ending last repeat at ** row 3 chain 3 turn skip next double_crochet *single_crochet in next 3 double_crochet** skip next double_crochet single_crochet double_crochet repeat from * across end last repeat at ** ch1 half_double_crochet in last single_crochet row 4 chain 3 turn put 2 double_crochet in first ch1 space *skip next single_crochet single_crochet in following single_crochet** shell repeat from * across ending last repeat at ** 3dc in turning chain space row 5 chain 1 turn single_crochet in first double_crochet *chain 3 skip next double_crochet single_crochet double_crochet** single_crochet in next 3 double_crochet repeat from * across ending last repeat at ** single_crochet in last 2 stitches last is turning chain repeat row 2-5 2 more times for 4 swatch square 2 pattern chain 77 row 1 ws single_crochet in the 2nd chain from the hook single_crochet in the next chain *chain 3 skip 2 chain** single_crochet in the next 3 chain repeat from * to the end ending last repetition at ** single_crochet in the last 2ch row 2 rs chain 1 turn skip the single_crochet *shell skip next single_crochet 1 single_crochet skip next single_crochet repeat from * until end sl into single_crochet skip last single_crochet row 3 ws chain 1 turn sl into the next 3 stitches single_crochet *ch3 skip next double_crochet single_crochet 3 skip double_crochet repeat from * until you finish your last 3 chain skip the first double_crochet as normal and single_crochet in the second then sl into the next stitch row 4 rs chain 1 turn skip the single_crochet *shell skip next single_crochet 1 single_crochet skip next single_crochet repeat from * until last shell sl into the next double_crochet the third double_crochet from the shell below chain 1 and turn repeat row 3 and 4 13 times until the work decreases to one shell remaining ending on a row 4 bind off continue to finishing finishing flip the work to rs facing for a clean smooth edge 1 chain 1 at the first double_crochet of the shell on the right-most corner half_double_crochet in every stitch along the edge until you reach the left-most edge of the work putting your last half_double_crochet by the
